/portfolio/whitestag.title: Autofusion AI
/portfolio/whitestag.description: Connecting businesses to their ideal customers using AI
p: Our goal was to highlight their innovative approach while providing a friendly experience that makes it easy to explore their services.

We prioritize optimal performance and seamless responsiveness across all devices. Our approach ensures fast loading times and smooth navigation, providing an excellent user experience on both desktop and mobile.

â€¢ Fast Loading Speed: We optimize images, scripts, and resources to ensure quick load times.â€¢ Optimized Code: Clean and efficient coding practices are employed to reduce unnecessary elements.â€¢ Scalability:Our performance-focused design ensures your website can handle increased traffic.

Responsiveness is key to delivering an exceptional user experience across all devices. We ensure that your website adjusts seamlessly to different screen sizes, from mobile phones to desktops, providing a consistent and intuitive interface. With fast load times and optimized navigation, users will enjoy smooth interactions no matter how they access your site.

Identifying and addressing areas for improvement is essential to maintaining a high-quality user experience. Whether it's optimizing site speed, enhancing service offerings, or refining design elements, continuous improvement is key.

To stay ahead in a competitive market, it's vital to constantly assess and improve your website and services. We dive deep into performance analytics, user behavior, and customer feedback to uncover pain points and areas for enhancement. From optimizing load times and refining user interfaces to improving service features and functionality.

Effective communication and smooth deployment are at the heart of our process. We keep you informed every step of the way, ensuring your vision is brought to life exactly as you imagined. Our team collaborates closely with you to address any questions or concerns.

Clear communication and efficient deployment are essential to the success of any project. We maintain open lines of communication throughout the entire process, ensuring your goals and expectations are met. Our team actively listens and collaborates with you to refine details and offer guidance. When itâ€™s time to deploy, we ensure a smooth transition, handling all technical aspects to guarantee a flawless launch.
Have questions? Our FAQ section has you covered with quick answers to the most common inquiries.
Effortlessly connect with your favorite tools. Whether it's your CRM, email marketing platform.
Why do this instead of hiring an SDR?
How do you really define a 'qualified' meeting for payment?
Why wouldn't I just hire my own SDR team for long-term growth?
How much work is involved for my team? We're already stretched thin.
What if the prospect is just unpleasant or completely misunderstands our product despite your briefing?
What if we need more meetings? Or what if you can't hit 5?
How does the 'Pain Signals Targeting' actually work? Won't AI outreach sound generic or damage our brand reputation?
Ready to take the next step? Join us now and start transforming your vision into reality with expert support.

h4: 2. HOW DO WE PROCESS YOUR INFORMATION?
3. WHAT LEGAL BASES DO WE RELY ON TO PROCESS YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
4. WHEN AND WITH WHOM DO WE SHARE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
5. DO WE OFFER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PRODUCTS?
6. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
7. HOW DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION SAFE?
8. DO WE COLLECT INFORMATION FROM MINORS?
11. DO UNITED STATES RESIDENTS HAVE SPECIFIC PRIVACY RIGHTS?
12. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
13. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
14. HOW CAN YOU REVIEW, UPDATE, OR DELETE THE DATA WE COLLECT FROM YOU?
p: PERSONAL INFORMATION YOU DISCLOSE TO US
In Short: We collect personal information that you provide to us.

We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.

Personal Information Provided by You: The personal information that we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the Services, the choices you make, and the products and features you use. The personal information we collect may include the following:namesphone numbersemail addressesSensitive Information: We do not process sensitive information.Payment Data: We may collect data necessary to process your payment if you choose to make purchases, such as your payment instrument number, and the security code associated with your payment instrument. All payment data is handled and stored by Razorpay. You may find their privacy notice here: https://razorpay.com/privacy/
All personal information that you provide to us must be true, complete, and accurate, and you must notify us of any changes to such personal information.

In Short: We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent.We process your personal information for a variety of reasons, depending on how you interact with our Services, including:To deliver and facilitate delivery of services to the user.To respond to user inquiries/offer support to users.To send administrative information to you.To fulfil and manage your orders.To enable user-to-user communications.To request feedback.To identify usage trends.To save or protect an individual's vital interest.

In Short: We only process your personal information when we believe it is necessary and we have a valid legal reason (i.e. legal basis) to do so under applicable law.If you are located in the EU or UK, this section applies to you. The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and UK GDPR require us to explain the valid legal bases we rely on to process your personal information. We may rely on the following legal bases:

If you are located in Canada, we may process your information under express or implied consent, or other exceptions under Canadian law such as investigations, fraud prevention, business transactions, and more.
We may share information in specific situations described in this section and/or with the following third parties:
In Short: We offer products, features, or tools powered by artificial intelligence, machine learning, or similar technologies.
We partner with third-party AI service providers such as OpenAI, Anthropic, xAI, Groq, DeepSeek, and Hugging Face. Your personal information may be shared and processed by these providers.
Functions include automation, deployment, bots, development, document generation, predictive analytics, insights, and research.
To opt out, contact us using the information provided in this policy.

We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined unless otherwise required by law. When no ongoing business need exists, we delete or anonymize your data or securely store it until deletion is possible.

In Short: We aim to protect your personal information through a system of organizational and technical security measures. However, no system can guarantee 100% security. Use our Services only in a secure environment.
In Short: We do not knowingly collect data from or market to children under 18 years of age. If we learn we have collected such data, we will delete it.

In Short: Depending on your location, you may have rights under privacy laws (EEA, UK, Canada, and some US states), including the right to access, correct, delete, restrict, or object to processing, or withdraw consent. Contact us at atiksh@autofusion.ai to exercise your rights.
We do not currently respond to Do-Not-Track (DNT) signals as no uniform technology standard exists. We will update this policy if that changes.

In Short: Residents of certain states have rights such as access, correction, deletion, opt-out of sale, and non-discrimination. These rights vary by state and are subject to conditions. We do not sell or share personal information.
In Short: Yes, we update this notice as necessary to stay compliant with relevant laws. Changes will be reflected in the "Last updated" date and possibly via notification.
If you have questions or comments, contact us at atiksh@autofusion.ai
You have the right to request access to, update, or delete your personal information. Submit a data subject access request or contact us at atiksh@autofusion.ai.
Business address: B-42 Parijat, SV Road, Andheri West, Mumbai 400058

p: We find strangers that pay you â€” without any awkward intros.
We find strangers that pay you â€”
Never worry about sales again â€” our outreach systems make sure your calendar is filled with booked meetings.

Only speak to prospects ready to buy.
We don't just fill up your calendar with right people. We unlock your freedom to be selective, charge what your worth, and focus entirely on doing your best work.
We design outreach systems that send messages on your behalf to your ideal customers. Hereâ€™s how we take you from setup to scaling.
In the first two days, we define your ideal customer and find them using pain based targeting signals, craft an irresistible offer, and set up your outreach machine so everything is ready to run.
For 2â€“4 weeks, we test different offers and messaging across thousands of prospects. This ensures we know exactly what resonates with your prospects before scaling.
After 30 days, we analyze performance. If campaigns are winning, we scale to deliver consistent meetings. If not, we refine until we find a proven formula.
We build outreach systems that identify, reach, and convert your ideal customers reliably, every time.
We identify decision makers of companies who exactly match with your ideal customer.
Our algorithms source thousands of verified leads that match your customer profile.
Each prospect receives messaging crafted with proven to maximize response rates.
We test offers and copy at scale to discover what consistently drives results.
Qualified prospects book directly into your calendar without back-and-forth emails.
We track and analyze every campaign to refine performance and scale confidently.
Your calendar fills with sales-ready meetings automatically. No more chasing leadsâ€”just consistent opportunities showing up week after week.
We analyze thousands of data points to pinpoint real buyersâ€”so you only meet prospects who matter.
Once we find a winning campaign, we flip the switch and flood your pipeline with meetings.
